\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[T2A]{fontenc}
\usepackage[cp1251]{inputenc}
\usepackage{a4wide}
\sloppy

\newcommand{\testcyr}[3]{{\usefont{T2A}{#1}{#2}{#3}\LARGE Не подобьно
  есть въ есень цветь искати ни старца на воискоу гнати.} \par}

\newcommand{\beginfont}[1]{  
  \newpage 
  {
    {\usefont{T2A}{fhv}{bx}{n}\Huge{#1}}\\
    \bigskip{}\par
  }
}

\newcommand{\face}[1]{\usefont{T2A}{fhv}{m}{n}#1\par\nopagebreak}

\newcommand{\present}[2]{
  \beginfont{#2}
  
  \face{Medium upright}\testcyr{#1}{m}{n}
  \face{Medium italic}\testcyr{#1}{m}{it}
%  \face{Medium slanted}\testcyr{#1}{m}{sl}
  \face{Medium small caps}\testcyr{#1}{m}{sc}
%  \face{Medium upright italics}\testcyr{#1}{m}{ui}
%  \face{Medium outline}\testcyr{#1}{m}{ol}
  
  \face{Bold upright}\testcyr{#1}{b}{n}
  \face{Bold italic}\testcyr{#1}{b}{it}
%  \face{Bold slanted}\testcyr{#1}{b}{sl}
  \face{Bold small caps}\testcyr{#1}{b}{sc}
%  \face{Bold upright italics}\testcyr{#1}{b}{ui}
%  \face{Bold outline}\testcyr{#1}{b}{ol}
  
%  \face{Condensed upright}\testcyr{#1}{c}{n}
%  \face{Condensed italic}\testcyr{#1}{c}{it}
%  \face{Condensed slanted}\testcyr{#1}{c}{sl}
%  \face{Condensed small caps}\testcyr{#1}{c}{sc}
%  \face{Condensed upright italics}\testcyr{#1}{c}{ui}
%  \face{Condensed outline}\testcyr{#1}{c}{ol}
  
%  \face{Bold condensed upright}\testcyr{#1}{bc}{n}
%  \face{Bold condensed italic}\testcyr{#1}{bc}{it}
%  \face{Bold condensed slanted}\testcyr{#1}{bc}{sl}
%  \face{Bold condensed small caps}\testcyr{#1}{bc}{sc}
%  \face{Bold condensed upright italics}\testcyr{#1}{bc}{ui}
%  \face{Bold condensed outline}\testcyr{#1}{bc}{ol}
  
%  \face{Bold extended upright}\testcyr{#1}{bx}{n}
%  \face{Bold extended italic}\testcyr{#1}{bx}{it}
%  \face{Bold extended slanted}\testcyr{#1}{bx}{sl}
%  \face{Bold extended small caps}\testcyr{#1}{bx}{sc}
%  \face{Bold extended upright italics}\testcyr{#1}{bx}{ui}
%  \face{Bold extended outline}\testcyr{#1}{bx}{ol}
}
